entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Richmond Hill
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:10 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then periods of snow beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of freezing rain or rain. High plus 4.
